steps.title: Stop Burning Process
steps.subtitle: Remove from heat source, stop, drop, and roll if clothing on fire.

steps.title: Assess Burn Severity
steps.subtitle: Determine depth (1st, 2nd, 3rd degree) and percentage of body affected.

steps.title: Cool the Burn
steps.subtitle: Apply cool (not cold) water for 10â€“20 minutes to thermal burns.

steps.title: Remove Jewelry
steps.subtitle: Remove rings, watches before swelling occurs. Do not remove stuck clothing.

steps.title: Cover Burn
steps.subtitle: Use sterile gauze or clean cloth. Do not use ice, butter, or ointments.

steps.title: Pain Management
steps.subtitle: Provide appropriate pain relief, monitor for shock development.
